docs.title: 01 - SSH Keys
docs.text:
Create ssh keys for github and ssh

ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "your_email@example.com" -f ~/.ssh/ssh
ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "your_email@example.com" -f ~/.ssh/github

Edit ssh config and add below

nano .ssh/config

Host github.com
  HostName github.com
  IdentityFile ~/.ssh/github

Host *
  IdentitiesOnly yes
  IdentityFile ~/.ssh/ssh
  User robin

Get github public key and add it to github account at https://github.com/settings/keys

cat .ssh/github.pub
